summary: This bill, the Helping Optimize Prevention and Engagement for Heroes Act of 2025 (HOPE for Heroes Act), amends the Commander John Scott Hannon Veterans Mental Health Care Improvement Act of 2019. It modifies and reauthorizes the Staff Sergeant Parker Gordon Fox Suicide Prevention Grant Program. Key changes include reauthorization through 2030, adjustments to grant fund usage, a focus on performance-based metrics for additional funding, increased training, improved coordination for care continuity, and provisions for emergent suicide care. It also mandates the use of the Columbia Protocol for suicide risk screening and includes transportation services for appointments.
